body.name: Ride Safer Travel Vest with Zipped Backpack-Wearable, Lightweight, Compact, and Portable Car Seat. Perfect for Everyday use or Rideshare, Travel, and Rental Car. (Small/Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 11 hrs 51 mins
features: IT IS UNCONVENTIONAL and INNOVATIVE. This is a vest type Child Restraint System and uses a revolutionary technology to increase safety for the little traveler by optimizing the adult seat belt fit for their body.
IT IS SAFE AND LEGAL. This is certified for use in motor vehicles, meets or exceeds all applicable FMVSS 213 requirements so is legal to use in all US states.

IT IS COMPACT, ULTRA-LIGHTWEIGHT, AND PORTABLE. This is perfect for a family travel, fits 3-children in the same row of a vehicle with comfort and ease; ridesharing, taxi, or rental car. Great for grandparents and caregivers because it’s lightweight and easy to install and use.

IT CAN BE USED WITH OR WITHOUT TETHER. This is to use with a vehicle lap belt and top tether by securing the vest with a top tether anchor in the vehicle. Also, this can be used with a lap and shoulder belt only without a tether strap.
WHO CAN USE IT? The small size is recommended to use 3 years and above and a weight between 30 lbs. and 60 lbs.
body.description: RideSafer is a safe, convenient, easy, ultra-portable and comfortable alternative to booster seats and car seats. It is more convenient for travel, carpool, and/or multi-child families, and perfect for frequent taxi/Uber rides.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Safety? No Problem! Innovative technology just made for children! Safety Certified - meets or exceeds NHTSA FMVSS 213 (MGA Reference No.: C19S3-004.8, by MGA, September 2019) Ride Safer Travel Vest is tested and certified to the dynamic test requirements specified in FMVSS 213. Ride Safer Travel Vest is also designed to and complies with all of the other applicable requirements of FMVSS 213 for a harness including product labeling, webbing requirements and instruction manual. It means that the vest is tested to the same standards as regular car seats and has passed. (MGA Reference No.: C19S3-004.8, by MGA, September 2019)

Traveling with Kids? No Problem! Perfect alternative for bulky car/booster seats for travel! Lightweight! Easy to Carry! Ride Safer Travel vests are much easier to travel with than conventional child seats. They can fit into a suitcase or child’s backpack.

Carpooling? No Problem! 3 in a Row! Easy as you see! No more hassle for carpooling or changing pickup person We have been selected one of the Best 3 Across Car Seats for Carpools 2018 by Baby Bargains. "The Rider Safer Travel Vest 2 by Safe Travel Systems by Safe Traffic System is our top pick for an easy to use and portable solution for carpoolers. No bulky seats, no complex belt-paths—the vest positions the vehicle shoulder and lap belts to correctly fit a child 30 to 80 pounds..." (by Denise & Alan Fields, November 2018)

Kids can handle Ride Safer Travel Vest! Kids can carry their own car seats! RideSafer is light, packable, and easy to carry. Kids can carry their own car seats! Kids can wear their own car seats! RideSafer is wearable. Kids can wear their own car seats and move around! Kids can sit closer and play! RideSafer is slim. Kids can sit closer and talk and play! Kids can sit anywhere! RideSafer gives freedom. Kids can sit any seats in back seats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazing saw it on tiktok two years ago and came and bought it for a trip we just had to Mexico my baby is now a toddler so having to carry a bulky car seat was not part of my plans this vest made everything so easy and practical! It’s really easy to put on and off and is supper light love it also the seat belt feels tight on my little one really recommend this vest if you want to avoid carrying car seats around when traveling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Serves its purpose but runs a little large
reviews.reviewText: I have a 5 year old and 6 year old who are 35 and 44 lbs. My 5 is 40.5 inches tall and my 6 year old is 47 inches . I initially bought the S and the L, thinking that 6 was going to be too tall for the S.It turns out, the L was wayyyyy too big for her and the S fit perfectly. Meanwhile, the S was too big for 5. So I quickly bought an XS for 5. It arrived and fit perfectly, just in type for us to go on vacation!My kids wore these vests for 3 weeks while we traveled around Europe. They worked well for us! Once we got the rhythm down, 6 was able to latch herself in completely (and I just checked to make sure it was right).We will continue to use the 5 point harness seats at home. They are more comfortable for the kids and- let's be honest- their bulk makes me feel like they're safer.However, these vests are perfect for traveling. We will also use them when they need to hop into someone else's car!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Travel options for kids big and old enough!
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic option for traveling if your child is big and old enough! We are really into car seat/booster safety, but we also travel a lot (wife is in airline industry). When our kid was younger it was easier, but once they get older it’s such a pain to deal and travel with car seats, so we usually opted for trips like Disney or something where we wouldn’t need a car seat by taking Magical Express, but frustrating sometimes because we would of loved to take one or two of the days out of vacation to go to the beach, or visit family 2 hrs south of Orlando but having to bring car seat just for that to then sit in room rest of trip and hassle of carrying it around airport/plane sucked. We follow the Car Seat for the Littles and would never use something they didn’t approve of. Thankfully this is the ONLY safe and approved travel vest on the market (I will paste a link to their review down below). We finally got one and used for our first trip! It was so incredibly easy to carry around unlike a bulky car seat. It did take several YouTube videos and thoroughly reading instructions to get the hang out the vest, followed by sending pics to Car Seat for the Little page to verify we were installing and using correctly. Once we got the hang of it, it was super easy and quick. My kids only complaint was that you cant see out the window. I know they sell a booster seat that the vest can be used with (and only their booster), but it’s sold out until late fall/early winter it looks like. Definitely will be purchasing for future use or if needed to ride in someone else’s car. Highly recommend using the crotch strap for smaller kids, helped a ton, and using the top tether for smaller/younger kids (ours is 5.5yr but small). While this is a wearable booster, the tether helps a lot for kids who technically are booster ready, but are still in 5 point harness at home. Highly recommend for anyone who travels often or maybe switches cars sometimes, or other people or family driving kid every once in a while (I know I hate uninstalling and reinstalling car seat for one or two short drive or pick ups by family or friend every time, so this would be helpful for that too)!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for traveling
reviews.reviewText: We used this to travel with and it was so convenient. It packed small, is very light, and easy to "install". I don't know about the safety since we luckily never had to test that aspect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wish I tried this sooner
reviews.reviewText: I was unsure about this travel vest. I bought it to save space in the back seat as we downsized our vehicle and to my surprise, I like this better than a traditional booster seat. My daughter age, 6 could easily unstrap herself or maneuver out of the traditional backless booster. Many times on hard turns she was leaning over practically falling out of the booster. With this travel vest, she goes nowhere! My hubby set it up with the tether and she is safer in this than a booster and I highly recommend! It's very portable, so no need for multiple car seats or switching car seats for different vehicles and great for travel.My only complaint is that it now takes longer for her to buckle up, but that's cuz she insists on doing it herself every single time and sometimes she struggles with some of the buckles but that's expected for a 6 yro that thinks she's 20. 😆Overall, I highly recommend this product, especially as a safer and better alternative than traditional booster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my niece, she's at that age where she is slightly too big for a car seat. I got her this and it was easy to adjust to her size, she also is a pro at installing the belt parts. She claims it's very comfortable Ed Sheeran fell sleep in the car. The quality is incredible and I feel safe driving with her in the car. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved that I didn’t have to haul another car seat to the Caribbean! Worked very well and easily and was well made!
Nos gusta mucho, es completamente seguro, ergonómico, cómodo, práctico, ligero en su transportación de un auto a otro y a mi hijo le gusto mucho el diseño :)
Excelente opción para viajar, fácil de usar y ajustar
Love the neck rest and tether to keep them in upright sitting position and the backpack.Highly recommended this investment for kids’ safety!

Al principio no sabíamos como ponerlo correctamente y pensábamos que le habíamos pedido una talla muy grande, sin embargo aprendiendo a ajustarlo bien lo pudimos usar sin problema para un viaje que hicimos, seguro le durara un par de años ya que compramos el que le quedaba apenas pero que le daba la oportunidad de crecer y que le siguiera quedando, sin duda una gran opción para evitar cargar con sillas de niños o rentar en unas vacaciones.
Muy útil para viajes donde no puedes llevar car seat
